short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifications for Patter Rooms and Private Messages in Chrome. Requires an app.net account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a notification agent that will let you know when new Patter chats or PMs are available for your app.net account.

app.net is a paid service. patter-app.net is a free chat client which is built on top of it.
